price: 难道他们只企望末日时刻不知不觉地忽然来临他们吗？
arabic: هَلۡ يَنظُرُونَ إِلَّا ٱلسَّاعَةَ أَن تَأۡتِيَهُم بَغۡتَةٗ وَهُمۡ لَا يَشۡعُرُونَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: hal yanẓurūna illā al-sāʿata an tatiyahum baghtatan wahum lā yashʿurūna
